title: Tom Brady Facebook response to Deflategate: 'I am sorry our league had to endure this'
content:
Updated at 10:09 p.m. ET 
 
Tom Brady has responded. And of course, the response came via Facebook. 
 
After Brady claimed his win in court against the NFL and Roger Goodell on Thursday, he took to Facebook on Friday night for his first post-victory words. 
               
MORE: From draft to Deflategate, Tom Brady's career in photos | What's Brady's fantasy value?  | Brady humiliates NFL 
    
The regular season starts tomorrow morning and I can’t wait to fully commit my energy and emotion to focus on the...
Posted by Tom Brady on  Friday, September 4, 2
